titles.title: Campaign Spending Integrity Act

To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a candidate for election for Federal office from using amounts contributed to the candidate's campaign to make payments to vendors owned or controlled by the candidate.
Campaign Spending Integrity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Campaign Spending Integrity Act
This bill amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit a candidate for election to federal office from using amounts contributed to the candidate's campaign to make payments to vendors owned or controlled by the candidate.
